display.title: Other Details
display.body: LED-backlit display with IPS technology |  2880x1800 native resolution at 220 pixels per inch with support for millions of colours

connectivity.title: Wireless
connectivity.body: Wi-Fi : 802.11ac Wi-Fi wireless networking; IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n compatible

physical_specs.title: Ports
physical_specs.body: Four Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) ports with support for - Charging, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt (up to 40 Gbps), USB 3.1 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps)

processor.title: Processor Details
processor.body: Turbo Boost up to 4.3GHz, with 9MB shared L3 cache

processor.title: GPU
processor.body: Radeon Pro 560X with 4GB of GDDR5 memory and automatic graphics switching | Intel UHD Graphics 630

webcam_microphone.title: Video Support
webcam_microphone.body: Simultaneously supports full native resolution on the built-in display at millions of colours

webcam_microphone.title: Multiple Display
webcam_microphone.body: Up to two displays with 5120x2880 resolution at 60Hz at over a billion colours | Up to four displays with 4096x2304 resolution at 60Hz at over a billion colours

power.title: Battery and Power
power.body: Up to 10 hours wireless web | Up to 10 hours iTunes movie playback | Up to 30 days of standby time

sound.title: Speaker Description
sound.body: Stereo speakers with high dynamic range

keyboard.title: Keyboard
keyboard.body: Full-sized backlit keyboard with:- 64 (US) or 65 (ISO) keys including four arrow keysTouch Bar with integrated Touch ID sensor | Ambient light sensor

keyboard.title: Touchpad
keyboard.body: Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities; enables Force clicks, accelerators, pressure-sensitive drawing and Multi-Touch gestures

pre_installed_apps.title: Built-in Apps
pre_installed_apps.body: Photos, iMovie, GarageBand, Mail, Safari, Siri and more
